Except as otherwise provided in this RSU agreement or the Plan, no portion of the RSU will vest prior to three years from [GRANT DATE] (the “Grant Date”). On [VESTING DATE] (the “Vesting Date”), 100% of the RSUs will become vested. Upon vesting, you will receive one Share for each vested RSU, payable as soon as practicable (not more than 60 days) after the Vesting Date.
